treatment-md.title: Troxodania magnifica Khaustov & Trach, 2014, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Mites of the superfamily Pygmephoroidea (Acari: Heterostigmata: Neopygmephoridae, Pygmephoridae) associated with Trox cadaverinus (Coleoptera: Trogidae) from the Far East of Russia, with description of a new genus and two new species
